code: var CLOUD_NAME=process.env.REACT_APP_CLOUDINARY_CLOUD_NAME;var IMAGE_UPLOAD_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_CLOUDINARY_IMAGE_URL;var UPLOAD_PRESENT=process.env.REACT_APP_CLOUDINARY_UPLOAD_PRESENT;export var uploadImageCloudinary=function uploadImageCloudinary(file){var data=new FormData();data.append("file",file);data.append("cloud_name",CLOUD_NAME);data.append("upload_preset",UPLOAD_PRESENT);return fetch(IMAGE_UPLOAD_URL,{method:"post",body:data}).then(function(resp){return resp.json();}).then(function(_ref){var public_id=_ref.public_id,secure_url=_ref.secure_url;return{public_id:public_id,url:secure_url};});};export var uploadNewImage=function uploadNewImage(imageData){var isNew=imageData.isNew,file=imageData.file;if(isNew){return uploadImageCloudinary(file);}else{return Promise.resolve(file);}};
